definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Some practices in the China Church are difficult for people to understand.
sentences.chinese: 中国天主教会里面有一些做法让人实在看不懂。

sentences.english: Critics say he mishandled the sex-abuse scandal that has rocked the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 也有人认为他对震撼罗马天主教会的性丑闻处理不当。

sentences.english: Catechumen will freely decide if he or she wants to be baptized and become a member of the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 慕道者最终应自由的选择是否要领洗加入天主教会。

sentences.english: King Henry the Eighth of England had separated from the Roman Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 英国国王亨利八世从天主教会中分离出来。

sentences.english: But she has long left the Catholic Church and attends a Methodist church.
sentences.chinese: 但她早就离开天主教会，加入了卫里公教会。

sentences.english: The Catholic Church teaches that church traditions are as true and valid as the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 天主教会教导教会的传统和圣经一样真实有效。

sentences.english: I wanted to ask him if there was any reason why the Catholic Church would consider him for sainthood.
sentences.chinese: 我想问他天主教会不会有什么理由把他视为圣徒。

sentences.english: The Catholic church has a difficult relationship with Chinese nationalism.
sentences.chinese: 天主教会与中国民族主义的关系一直不顺。

sentences.english: Pope Francis is the first Roman Catholic Church leader from South America.
sentences.chinese: 教宗方济各是首位来自南美的罗马天主教会领袖。

sentences.english: The Catholic church has had a conference about astrobiology.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂冈天主教会举行了一场有关太空生物学的会议。

sentences.english: The beatified receive only local recognition, while saints are venerated throughout the Catholic Church.
sentences.chinese: 的福只得到当地的承认，而圣人的崇敬整个天主教会。

sentences.english: Joan of Arc was canonized by the Roman Catholic Church in 1920.
sentences.chinese: 圣女贞德于1920年被罗马天主教会封为圣徒。

sentences.english: The Catholic church ruled out admitting more non-faith students.
sentences.chinese: 天主教会不会招收更多的非基督徒学生。

sentences.english: In a 26-year papacy , he defined the Roman Catholic Church's role in modern times.
sentences.chinese: 担任教皇26年，确定天主教会在现代社会的角色。

sentences.english: The Roman Catholic Church regards marriage as indissoluble.
sentences.chinese: 天主教会认为婚姻关系是不容解除的。

sentences.english: They tried to split the United Church of Catholicism.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾试图分裂联合天主教会。

definition: the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican
old teachings/wisdom from the past/old church/the Catholic Church 天主教 as opposed to Protestantism 新教
